summary: A simple texture edit to the vanilla scimitar to give it.. a little more character. uses the vanilla normal maps.
descriptionHtml:
Firstly; I am a novice modder, and this is the first mod I have shared anywhere on the internet. Now that that's out of the way..

This is a simple texture edit to the vanilla scimitar to give it.. a little more character. uses the vanilla normal maps.

Installation: just drag and drop the "textures" folder into your skyrim "data" folder. overwrite (merge folders) when prompted.

To uninstall; just go int your Skyrim "data" folder, go into textures, then weapons, and delete the dds. file called "scimitar", or delete the file folder with the same name as the dds. file.
author: Mythos214
